        public boolean processNextBatch()
        Description copied from interface: BoltConnection
        Executes a batch of queued jobs, which is executed in an another thread (which is part of a thread pool)
        Specified by:
        processNextBatch in interface BoltConnection
        Returns:
        false when no more processing should take place (i.e. connection is closed)

      • handleSchedulingError

        public void handleSchedulingError​(Throwable t)
        Description copied from interface: BoltConnection
        Invoked when an exception is caught during the scheduling of the pending jobs. The caught exception would mostly be RejectedExecutionException which is thrown by the thread pool executor when it fails to accept submitted jobs
        Specified by:
        handleSchedulingError in interface BoltConnection
        Parameters:
        t - the exception occurred during scheduling
